title: Scope & success criteria for Cognetivy v2
article_markdown:
## Goal
Design the next version of Cognetivy by using Cognetivy itself as the execution log.

## What we will enforce
- A **step article** for every workflow node (separate from any produced collections).
- **Strict collection kinds** with required fields.
- **Human in the loop**: steps advance only when a human appends step events and approves decision items.

## Immediate acceptance criteria (draft)
- Traceability fields are present for every collected entity.
- Workflow versions have a human name + description in stored specs.

## Notes
This is intentionally stored as `step_articles` to keep reasoning separate from data collections.
